original_body_lines: A total of 955 more suspects have been arrested by Sri Lanka’s police and security forces personnel within a 24-hour window ending at 12.30 a.m. today (Jan. 23) as part of the ongoing countrywide anti-drug operation ‘Yukthiya’.
According to the Ministry of Public Security, the narcotics taken into custody during this 24-hour window include 187g of heroin, 126g of crystal methamphetamine (Ice) and 136 narcotic pills.
